full_summary:
# Solar PV System Installation

## About the Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors for the installation of a solar PV system at the DFO Eastern Area office building in Sydney, Nova Scotia.

### Tender Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS3915080267-Doc3915733226 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3915080267 |
| **Publication Date** | March 15, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | April 6, 2023 (2:00 PM) |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |

### Project Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) requires construction services for the installation of a 100 kW solar PV system on the roof of the DFO Eastern Area office building in Sydney, Nova Scotia. Work will include the installation of solar panels, associated cabling, and testing.

### Tender Requirements

* Contractors must have been invited to participate as a result of the pre-qualification process that was recently completed for all interested contractors.
* A highest price will be used to select the contract.

### Contact Information

* For further information regarding this tender, please contact:
	+ Richard Parsons, Supply Incident Coordinator
	+ Email: richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Location

The DFO Eastern Area office building is located in Sydney, Nova Scotia, Canada.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: April 6, 2023 (2:00 PM)
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 12, 2023

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies

We expect it will be exciting to apply for or participate in this tender.
